header.author: Claud. Nic. le Cat
header.title: An Observation of an Operation Made by the High Apparatus, According to M. le Cat's Method, in the Year 1743; by Claud. Nic. le Cat, M. D. F. R. S. Surgeon to the Hotel Dieu at Rouen, and Royal Demonstrator in Anatomy and Surgery; Translated from the French by Philip Henry Zollman, F. R. S.
